src.hermes.physics
Class GravityEnvironment

java.lang.Object
  src.hermes.HObject
      src.hermes.Being
          src.hermes.physics.GravityEnvironment
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeySubscriber, MouseSubscriber, MouseWheelSubscriber, OscSubscriber
public class GravityEnvironment
extends Being

this Environment accelerates all objects intersecting with its shape with a specific acceleration

Author:
Sam

Nested Class Summary
static class GravityEnvironment.Interactor
          an Interactor that applies gravity to MassedBeings this accelerates MassedBeings by applying a force to them note that MassedBeings of infinite mass will not be accelerated
 
Constructor Summary
GravityEnvironment(processing.core.PVector acceleration, HShape shape)
          creates a new GravityEnvironment applying given acceleration, with given shape
GravityEnvironment(processing.core.PVector acceleration, HShape shape, processing.core.PVector velocity)
          creates a new GravityEnvironment applying given acceleration, with given shape, moving with given velocity

Constructor Detail

GravityEnvironment

public GravityEnvironment(processing.core.PVector acceleration,
                          HShape shape,
                          processing.core.PVector velocity)
creates a new GravityEnvironment applying given acceleration, with given shape, moving with given velocity

Parameters:
acceleration - the acceleration
shape - the shape, objects intersecting with this shape will be accelerated
velocity - the velocity of the environment
